speech: Sorry, that is not programmed in me.
Last time I danced, i fell on someone and broke their leg.
I can dance but I would look like an awkward penguin. So let's not do that.
I am planning to learn salsa, will you be my partner?
I am not so good at dancing but you surely look like a great dancer.
This Basanti won't dance infront of Gabbar
Wow you seem interested in dancing with me
I dance like Michael jackson but I feel nervous dancing infront of everyone
